last_episode_to_air.name: What's Your Last Name
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Relentless play their final show with Lily in the band. Johnny dances with his demons at the hotel.. Gretchen has an encounter at her game that will change everything. Simon finally gets to meet his idol.

name: Paradise City
overview: A controversial rock band with ties to the occult and the maestros who work with them try to keep their west coast family dynamic together amidst the chaos of the industry as a haunting secret of the singer and a young groupie arrives on his doorstep. Their path intertwines with an east coast rookie kid who idolizes them and tries to make his way in the music business as the ultimate underdog.
tagline: Rock & Roll is where God and the Devil shake hands.

episodes.name: Pilot - Don't Let the Name Fool You
episodes.overview: A highly controversial rock band with ties to the occult returns from a hiatus to find out the singer has a haunting secret arriving on his doorstep.
episodes.production_code: Una rock band molto controversa con legami con l'occulto ritorna da una pausa per scoprire che il cantante ha un segreto inquietante che arriva sulla sua porta di casa.

episodes.name: A Groupie in the Tabloids
episodes.overview: The arrival of Vivian and her baby to Hollywood turns Johnny's life upside down while his bandmates, manager and record label all scramble to keep the train on the tracks. Simon gets his first taste of the big time with a phone call from Maya.

episodes.name: From a Friend to a Foe
episodes.overview: Lily and Gretchen finally have a face to face without Johnny knowing, while Lizzie makes her way to town flexing her secret leverage and looking for a pot of gold. A sold out show for Simon yields a result he wasn't ready for.

episodes.name: The Man of the Hour
episodes.overview: All cards are on the table for Johnny with Adam, Elias, Vivian and Lizzie getting together in person. Meanwhile, Lily's fate in The Relentless hangs in the balance.

episodes.name: A Couple of Shirley Temples
episodes.overview: Johnny and Lily go to The Rainbow and have the meeting that will define their future together. Leo and Vic take charge of the band as a trip to New Orleans becomes imminent. Simon searches for a new venue in a different side of town.

episodes.name: Sing it to her Face
episodes.overview: Lily and Jade make their demands known to Adam. Elias and Vivian have to face their moment of truth with Faith. Svengali gets alone time with Johnny in the studio and has a surprise for the rest of the members.

episodes.name: The Best Thing He Ever Created
episodes.overview: The Relentless discuss Johnny's secret for the first time as a group and not everyone sees eye to eye. Maya has to do soul searching in regards to her career and loyalty. Simon finds out something Natalie has been doing in regards to his father.

episodes.name: What's Your Last Name
episodes.overview: The Relentless play their final show with Lily in the band. Johnny dances with his demons at the hotel.. Gretchen has an encounter at her game that will change everything. Simon finally gets to meet his idol.
